pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric Causality in Quantiles Test // Implements the nonparametric causality-in-quantiles test (in mean or variance), returning a test object with an S3 plot() method. The current implementation uses one lag of each series (first- order Granger causality setup). Methodology is based on Balcilar, Gupta, and Pierdzioch (2016a) doi:10.1016/j.resourpol.2016.04.004 and Balcilar et al. (2016) doi:10.1007/s11079-016-9388-x.
